# louroux

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

louroux is a data processing application for the Louroux observatory site (University of Tours and Zone Atelier Loire site).

## Installation

``` {r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("https://github.com/LouisManiere/louroux.git")
```
